C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: compare-mobileconfig
command:
# install full version of diff (busybox is not enought)
apk update
apk add diffutils

expected_file="/test_expected/vpn-vpn.mobileconfig"
actual_file="/test/vpn-vpn.mobileconfig"

# ensure path is present
mkdir -p $(dirname $expected_file)

cat <<EOF > $expected_file

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<!DOCTYPE plist PUBLIC "-//Apple//DTD PLIST 1.0//EN" "http://www.apple.com/DTDs/PropertyList-1.0.dtd">
<plist version="1.0">
<dict>
  <key>ConsentText</key>
  <dict>
    <key>default</key>
    <string>iOS Profile vpn@vpn.example.com</string>
  </dict>
  <key>HasRemovalPasscode</key>
  <false/>
  <key>PayloadContent</key>
  <array>
    
    <dict>
      <key>UserDefinedName</key>
      <string>vpn.example.com always</string>
    
      <key>PayloadDisplayName</key>
      <string>vpn.example.com always</string>
    
      <key>PayloadIdentifier</key>
      <string>vpn.example.com.vpn.always</string>
    
      <key>PayloadUUID</key>
      <string>7A48801E2EE20A88BE29C703D8AB15EEB5A1B0C7</string>
    
      <key>VPNType</key>
      <string>IPSec</string>
    
      <key>IPSec</key>
      <dict>
        <key>RemoteAddress</key>
        <string>vpn.example.com</string>
    
        <key>AuthenticationMethod</key>
        <string>SharedSecret</string>
    
        <key>XAuthName</key>
        <string>vpn</string>
    
        <key>XAuthPassword</key>
        <string>password</string>
    
        <key>XAuthEnabled</key>
        <integer>1</integer>
    
        <key>LocalIdentifierType</key>
        <string>KeyID</string>
    
        <key>SharedSecret</key>
        <data>
        eW91cl9wcmVzaGFyZWRrZXk=
        </data>
      </dict>
    
      <key>PayloadType</key>
      <string>com.apple.vpn.managed</string>
    
      <key>PayloadVersion</key>
      <integer>1</integer>
    
      <key>OnDemandEnabled</key>
      <integer>1</integer>
    
      <key>OnDemandRules</key>
      <array>
        <dict>
          <key>Action</key>
          <string>Connect</string>
        </dict>
      </array>
    
      <key>OverridePrimary</key>
      <true/>
    
      <key>IPv4</key>
      <dict>
        <key>OverridePrimary</key>
        <integer>1</integer>
      </dict>
    
    </dict>
    <dict>
      <key>UserDefinedName</key>
      <string>vpn.example.com manual</string>
    
      <key>PayloadDisplayName</key>
      <string>vpn.example.com manual</string>
    
      <key>PayloadIdentifier</key>
      <string>vpn.example.com.vpn.manual</string>
    
      <key>PayloadUUID</key>
      <string>AC75AC649AA2452990D5C3CFFB817044B9855E79</string>
    
      <key>VPNType</key>
      <string>IPSec</string>
    
      <key>IPSec</key>
      <dict>
        <key>RemoteAddress</key>
        <string>vpn.example.com</string>
    
        <key>AuthenticationMethod</key>
        <string>SharedSecret</string>
    
        <key>XAuthName</key>
        <string>vpn</string>
    
        <key>XAuthPassword</key>
        <string>password</string>
    
        <key>XAuthEnabled</key>
        <integer>1</integer>
    
        <key>LocalIdentifierType</key>
        <string>KeyID</string>
    
        <key>SharedSecret</key>
        <data>
        eW91cl9wcmVzaGFyZWRrZXk=
        </data>
      </dict>
    
      <key>PayloadType</key>
      <string>com.apple.vpn.managed</string>
    
      <key>PayloadVersion</key>
      <integer>1</integer>
    
      <key>OverridePrimary</key>
      <true/>
    
      <key>IPv4</key>
      <dict>
        <key>OverridePrimary</key>
        <integer>1</integer>
      </dict>
    
    </dict>
    <dict>
      <key>UserDefinedName</key>
      <string>vpn.example.com Wi-Fi</string>
    
      <key>PayloadDisplayName</key>
      <string>vpn.example.com Wi-Fi</string>
    
      <key>PayloadIdentifier</key>
      <string>vpn.example.com.vpn.wifi</string>
    
      <key>PayloadUUID</key>
      <string>1630A29621C0D601FD70F4D97BBEC1BBEDA3D0E7</string>
    
      <key>VPNType</key>
      <string>IPSec</string>
    
      <key>IPSec</key>
      <dict>
        <key>RemoteAddress</key>
        <string>vpn.example.com</string>
    
        <key>AuthenticationMethod</key>
        <string>SharedSecret</string>
    
        <key>XAuthName</key>
        <string>vpn</string>
    
        <key>XAuthPassword</key>
        <string>password</string>
    
        <key>XAuthEnabled</key>
        <integer>1</integer>
    
        <key>LocalIdentifierType</key>
        <string>KeyID</string>
    
        <key>SharedSecret</key>
        <data>
        eW91cl9wcmVzaGFyZWRrZXk=
        </data>
      </dict>
    
      <key>PayloadType</key>
      <string>com.apple.vpn.managed</string>
    
      <key>PayloadVersion</key>
      <integer>1</integer>
    
      <key>OnDemandEnabled</key>
      <integer>1</integer>
    
      <key>OnDemandRules</key>
      <array>
        <dict>
          <key>InterfaceTypeMatch</key>
          <string>WiFi</string>
    
          <key>SSIDMatch</key>
          <array>
          </array>
    
          <key>Action</key>
          <string>Disconnect</string>
        </dict>
        <dict>
          <key>InterfaceTypeMatch</key>
          <string>WiFi</string>
    
          <key>Action</key>
          <string>Connect</string>
        </dict>
        <dict>
          <!-- VPN Default state -->
          <key>Action</key>
          <string>Disconnect</string>
        </dict>
      </array>
    
      <key>OverridePrimary</key>
      <true/>
    
      <key>IPv4</key>
      <dict>
        <key>OverridePrimary</key>
        <integer>1</integer>
      </dict>
    
    </dict>
  </array>
  <key>PayloadDisplayName</key>
  <string>iOS Profile to vpn.example.com with user vpn</string>
  <key>PayloadDescription</key>
  <string>This iOS Profile provides VPN connection to vpn.example.com with the user vpn</string>
  <key>PayloadIdentifier</key>
  <string>vpn.example.com.vpn.ios-profile</string>
  <key>PayloadOrganization</key>
  <string>vpn.example.com</string>
  <key>PayloadRemovalDisallowed</key>
  <false/>
  <key>PayloadType</key>
  <string>Configuration</string>
  <key>PayloadUUID</key>
  <string>96EA10AB95F653AF53DD78FBCA737E4ED68DFE56</string>
  <key>PayloadVersion</key>
  <integer>1</integer>
</dict>
</plist>
EOF

diff \
  --ignore-all-space \
  --ignore-blank-lines \
  $expected_file \
  $actual_file
